alert.note: Alert for Clermont (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 6:24PM EDT until July 24 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Kenton County in northern Kentucky... Campbell County in northern Kentucky... Northern Pendleton County in northern Kentucky... Southwestern Clermont County in southwestern Ohio... * Until 715 PM EDT. * At 624 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Claryville, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Independence, Alexandria, Claryville, New Richmond, Butler, Ryland Heights, Mentor, Moscow, California, Visalia, Atwood, Grants Lick, Aspen Grove, Morning View, Gubser Mill, Peach Grove, White Villa, Ivor, Campbell County Lake and White Tower. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
